mapper.select: SELECT MQTT_LIST_KEY, MQTT_LIST_APART, MQTT_LIST_DCOD, IFNULL(MQTT_LIST_FLOOR,'') AS MQTT_LIST_FLOOR, CODE.CODE_CONTENT, MQTT_LIST_NAME, MQTT_LIST_NUM, MQTT_LIST_USE FROM mqtt_list LEFT JOIN opener_code CODE ON CODE.CODE_CODE = MQTT_LIST_FLOOR where mqtt_list_dcod = #{dcod} group by mqtt_list_floor

SELECT USER_ID, USER_ADDR, MQTT_LIST_KEY, MQTT_LIST_APART, MQTT_LIST_DCOD, IFNULL(CODE.CODE_CONTENT,'') AS DCOD_NAME, MQTT_LIST_FLOOR, IFNULL(CODE2.CODE_CONTENT,'') AS FLOOR_NAME, MQTT_LIST_NAME, MQTT_LIST_NUM, IFNULL(LIKE_LIKE,"2") as LIKE_LIKE FROM OPENER_USER_ADDR LEFT JOIN MQTT_LIST ON MQTT_LIST_KEY = USER_ADDR LEFT JOIN opener_user_addr_like ON LIKE_ADDR = MQTT_LIST_KEY AND LIKE_USER_ID = #{userId} LEFT JOIN opener_code CODE ON CODE.CODE_CODE = MQTT_LIST_DCOD LEFT JOIN opener_code CODE2 ON CODE2.CODE_CODE = MQTT_LIST_FLOOR WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} and MQTT_LIST_USE=1 ORDER BY MQTT_LIST_DCOD, MQTT_LIST_FLOOR, MQTT_LIST_KEY

SELECT MQTT_ACTION_KEY, MQTT_ACTION_NUM, DATE_FORMAT(MQTT_ACTION_REQDATE, '%y.%m.%d %T') AS MQTT_ACTION_REQDATE, MQTT_ACTION_ANSDATE, MQTT_ACTION_CMD, MQTT_ACTION_USER, MQTT_ACTION_LOG, IFNULL(CODE.CODE_CONTENT,'') AS DCOD_NAME, IFNULL(CODE2.CODE_CONTENT,'') AS FLOOR_NAME, MQTT_LIST_NAME, IFNULL(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, MQTT_ACTION_REQDATE, MQTT_ACTION_ANSDATE), '99') AS DIFF, IFNULL(OPEN.CODE_CONTENT, '스마트키') AS OPEN_TYPE, MQTT_ACTION_STATE FROM mqtt_action LEFT JOIN bridge_code OPEN ON OPEN.CODE_CODE = MQTT_ACTION_OPEN LEFT JOIN MQTT_LIST ON MQTT_LIST_NUM = MQTT_ACTION_NUM LEFT JOIN bridge_code CODE ON CODE.CODE_CODE = MQTT_LIST_DCOD LEFT JOIN bridge_code CODE2 ON CODE2.CODE_CODE = MQTT_LIST_FLOOR WHERE MQTT_ACTION_USER = #{userId} AND MQTT_ACTION_STATE IN ('1', '15') ORDER BY MQTT_ACTION_REQDATE DESC LIMIT ${page},${pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM mqtt_action WHERE MQTT_ACTION_USER = #{userId} AND MQTT_ACTION_CMD = '2'
AND DATE_FORMAT(MQTT_ACTION_REQDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{sdate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{edate}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT ROOM_DOOR_BS, ROOM_DOOR_KEY, ROOM_DOOR_RONO, IFNULL(ROOM_PASS_USER, '') AS ROOM_PASS_USER, IFNULL(ROOM_PASS_CLEANER, '') AS ROOM_PASS_CLEANER, IFNULL(ROOM_PASS_MASTER, '') AS ROOM_PASS_MASTER, IFNULL(ROOM_TIME_DOOR, '') AS ROOM_TIME_DOOR, IFNULL(ROOM_TIME_PASS, '') AS ROOM_TIME_PASS, ROOM_DOOR_DATE, ROOM_DOOR_USER, ROOM_DOOR_ADMIN FROM fo_room_door WHERE ROOM_DOOR_RONO = #{rono} AND ROOM_DOOR_BS = #{bsCode} LIMIT 1

SELECT MQTT_ACTION_KEY, MQTT_ACTION_HOTEL, MQTT_ACTION_NUM, MQTT_ACTION_REQDATE, MQTT_ACTION_ANSDATE, MQTT_ACTION_CMD, MQTT_ACTION_STATE, MQTT_ACTION_USER, MQTT_ACTION_LOG, MQTT_ACTION_OPEN, MQTT_ACTION_REMARK FROM mqtt_action WHERE MQTT_ACTION_STATE = '15' AND MQTT_ACTION_USER = #{userId} AND MQTT_ACTION_ANSDATE IS NOT NULL AND MQTT_ACTION_HOTEL = #{hotelCode} ORDER BY MQTT_ACTION_ANSDATE DESC LIMIT 1
